channel.title: A biginners guide to faking your death on the internet
channel.description:
Thought i would share this with you guys
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZXUHy8vrVY0]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZXUHy8vrVY0[/url]
[size=20pt][b]I DID NOT CREATE THIS, I JUST THINK IT IS A GOOD TUTORIAL[/B][/size]

item.title: A biginners guide to faking your death on the internet
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

jonyo:

OMG guys! This is jonyo’s grandmother’s uncle. He got in a deadly car crash because he passed out from his terminal illness, pwnditus. We don’t know if he’ll be okay… like OMG more info at 7!!!

Who?

Read full topic
item.source: A biginners guide to faking your death on the internet

item.title: A biginners guide to faking your death on the internet
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Unid H4x0r:

the video makes |no sense|…

ohlo, I thought it made sence, the underlying sarcastic manor is aimed at the annoying people noobs who actually attempt to fake their own deaths on the internet.

item.title: A biginners guide to faking your death on the internet
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:6, topic:157423”][quote author=dragonus18 link=topic=214647.msg1873731#msg1873731 date=1194471425]

Anyone want to link me to where it say we can’t link to a tutorial on another website?

Here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,2930.0.html

i read it, and it says nothing about not being able to, maybe you should read it to?

i stopped listening becuz the guy sounded like a brit or something.
[/quote]
Make sure your tutorials have a good description so we don’t have to go to 3rd party websites
What is Youtube if its not a 3rd party site?[/quote]
You fail. It’s saying make sure the person knows what the tutorial is about before they are required to go to a 3rd party website, which necessitates a good description.

I know exactly what this tutorial is about before I click the link, therefore it complies with said rule.

Read full topic
item.source: A biginners guide to faking your death on the internet

item.title: A biginners guide to faking your death on the internet
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:6, topic:157423”][quote author=dragonus18 link=topic=214647.msg1873731#msg1873731 date=1194471425]

Anyone want to link me to where it say we can’t link to a tutorial on another website?

Here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,2930.0.html

i read it, and it says nothing about not being able to, maybe you should read it to?

i stopped listening becuz the guy sounded like a brit or something.
[/quote]
Make sure your tutorials have a good description so we don’t have to go to 3rd party websites
What is Youtube if its not a 3rd party site?

And this;

No stupid or not useful tutorials. If you think it is stupid, you’re probably right, so don’t post it.[/quote]

Manipulating rules to make new ones just doesn’t work.

Read full topic
